Docs.summary: Specifies the ephemeral disk placement for operating system disk for all VMs in the pool. This property can be used by user in the request to choose the location e.g., cache disk space for Ephemeral OS disk provisioning. For more information on Ephemeral OS disk size requirements, please refer to Ephemeral OS disk size requirements for Windows VMs at https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/windows/ephemeral-os-disks#size-requirements and Linux VMs at https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/linux/ephemeral-os-disks#size-requirements.
